RouterAdded(address,address).notice: Emitted when a new router is added

RouterOwnerAccepted(address,address,addr.notice: Emitted when the owner of router is accepted

RouterOwnerProposed(address,address,addr.notice: Emitted when the owner of router is proposed

RouterRecipientSet(address,address,addre.notice: Emitted when the recipient of router is updated

RouterRemoved(address,address).notice: Emitted when an existing router is removed

acceptProposedRouterOwner(address,uint25.notice: New router owner must accept role, or previous if proposed is 0x0

proposeRouterOwner(address,address,Route.notice: Current owner or router may propose a new router owner

removeRouter(address,RouterPermissionsMa.notice: Used to remove routers that can transact crosschain

setRouterRecipient(address,address,Route.notice: Sets the designated recipient for a router
